name: Sylvi Sahoo
aboutMeHeadline: I am Sylvi Sahoo, a Mobile App Developer
aboueMeDetails: Experienced Mobile App Developer with 2+ years of expertise in cross-platform development using Flutter, Dart, Java, and Kotlin. Passionate about crafting intuitive and visually appealing mobile interfaces. Skilled in agile development methodologies and collaborating with cross-functional teams. Committed to staying up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in mobile app development. Proficient in Firebase and Git. Currently contributing to innovative projects at Neophyte Ambient Intelligence Pvt Ltd. , a Reliance-backed company.
